data.message:
Hello! My name is Yana, I'm 20 years old.

      Please forgive me for not knowing your names. After all, it's you posting posts in official websites, social networking pages and so on.

       Voted in the MTV Europe Music Awards who like creativity, follow the news, listen to all the tracks, learn all the texts, buy albums, watch every clip on the channels EminemVEVO, EminemMusic and other official sources, admire the battles, watch Live through screens, and someone more lucky - come to concer
